description:
Hevlaska is an Exorcist of the http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch] of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. Holder of The Cube that holds the instructions written by those who made Innocence, she has been acting as the Black Order`s prophet and keeper of the shards of Innocence for about one hundred years.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki
name: Hevlaska
